name: Dizital ImageClub - Neo
description:
Dedicated VR and MR games

Enjoy the H store with a choice of situations in VR (store) or MR (home).

A situation where she is an idol and has loving sex with her.

A situation where the company is fired and the president's daughter is kidnapped and confined for sex.
She refuses to kiss him, but when certain conditions are met?

Use the camera and monitor to view the H scene from any angle you like.
Items can be moved to any position by hand.

You can experience a realistic kiss that only a game can provide, which cannot be experienced in a VR movie.

Equipped with voice recognition function
Speak "Coming" into the microphone and the sex scene will head toward the finish.
Several other keywords are supported.
Please read the in-game instructions.
You can speak lines from the menu without using the voice function.

Equipped with bukkake function, let's pour a lot of it on them.

Interlocking of vibration of VR controller and electric masturbator
The VR controller vibrates in accordance with the animation. On PC, it also works with an electric masturbator.
(Electric masturbator is limited to PC only.　 Operation has been confirmed with A10 Cyclone SA and The Handy. )

Playable in MR. (PCVR will be green background (Color 0,153,51))
You can adjust the position of the scene and the lighting to fit your room.

In addition to characters, MR can also display beds and restraints.

Other features include the ability to customize the girl, the ability to react when touching or licking the girl, and the ability to remove her clothes by hand,
There are many other elements that enhance the sense of realism.
